aws_ecs_capacity_provider.description: Provides an ECS cluster capacity provider.

name.description: The name of the capacity provider.

auto_scaling_group_provider.description: Nested argument defining the provider for the ECS auto scaling group. Defined below.

id.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the capacity provider.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the capacity provider.
